title: F4: Live brief generation
description: Brief panel updates after each exchange. Clarity meter with %. Missing elements listed. User can edit brief. Edits preserved across turns.

title: Integration: Document Editing & Git
description: vim integration for document editing. Git commits at phase transitions, tags at milestones.

title: SPARK Phase: Idea Entry
description: Capture initial idea with minimal friction. First user touchpoint.

title: F3: Q&A dialogue (SHAPE)
description: AI asks clarifying questions. Conversation history persisted/scrollable. Quick-reply suggestions. Pause/resume support. Max 10-15 questions.

title: TUI shell with Textual
description: Basic Textual app structure with screen navigation. Keyboard-first (j/k, Tab, q). Foundation for all phases.
close_reason: Implemented Textual TUI with refined chat interface, vim keybindings, BaseDialogueScreen foundation

title: F5: Product spec generation
description: One-click generation from finalized brief. Standard sections (vision, features, data model, FAQ). Saved to .waypoints/docs/product-spec.md

title: F1: Project initialization and resume
description: waypoints command with no args shows selector/creator. waypoints <path> opens/creates project. Init git if needed. Load state from .waypoints/

title: F10: Git commits and tags
description: Git commit at phase transitions. Git tag when flight plan finalized. Descriptive, consistent messages.

title: F8: State persistence
description: All state survives app close/reopen: current phase, dialogue history, brief/spec docs, waypoints. Append-only JSONL for crash recovery.

title: CHART Phase: Waypoint Generation & Manipulation
description: Decompose spec into executable waypoints. User can adjust the flight plan.

title: SHAPE Phase: Q&A Dialogue & Brief Generation
description: Socratic dialogue to crystallize ideas into briefs and specs. Core value proposition.

title: F2: Idea entry screen (SPARK)
description: Single text input for idea. Ideas stored immediately. Recent projects visible. Transition to SHAPE on Begin Journey.
close_reason: Implemented SPARK screen and Agent SDK integration

title: F6: Waypoint generation (CHART)
description: AI generates waypoints from spec. Each has ID, title, objective, acceptance criteria, deps. Multi-hop for epics. No cycles. Stored in flight-plan.jsonl

title: Anthropic Agent SDK integration
description: Set up Claude API client using Anthropic Agent SDK. Handle API key config. Basic conversation loop for Q&A.
close_reason: Implemented SPARK screen and Agent SDK integration

title: F9: Document editing via $EDITOR
description: e key opens doc in $EDITOR. Changes saved on close. App refreshes display after edit.

title: F7: Waypoint manipulation
description: Select to view details. Edit title/objective/criteria. Break down (AI-assisted). Merge adjacent. Reorder respecting deps. Delete with warning.
